page.title: 02GENERAL SURVEY.
page.content: Situated at the southern end of the rich, fertile{Vale of Clwyd,}it comes as no suprise to learn that farming is the main industry. Indeed, the main feature of the area is the {Agricultural College at Llysfasi}which offers courses to residential and day students. The main{language}of the area is {Welsh}although the number of speakers is slowly decreasing as non Welsh speakers move in.The majority of children at{Pentrecelyn school}are natural Welsh speakers and everyone is totally{bilingual}by the time they leave. There is a wide variety of wild life present, including{birds of {prey,and small mammals.}The lanes have many types of wild flowers,whilst the{rare wild orchids}can be found on {Graig Adwy Wynt.
